attributes.action: Make stop & search by the police fair.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We respect the government's concerns on violent attacks through weapons and other means, which has led to the granting of the police the power to stop and search anyone.But upon observations for a while, it only seems the minority are mainly targeted. Help us get the government to review it and make officers to search fairly and not target a particular group of people.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
